00036 DRAM::DRAM()
00037 {
00038     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00039     {
00040         dc[i].dramBusyTime = 0;
00041         dc[i].dramBusyCycles = 0;       
00042         dc[i].dramBankBusyTime.resize(NO_OF_RANKS);
00043         dc[i].dramBankBusyCycles.resize(NO_OF_RANKS);
00044         
00045         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00046         {
00047             dc[i].dramBankBusyTime[j].resize(NO_OF_BANKS);
00048             dc[i].dramBankBusyCycles[j].resize(NO_OF_BANKS);
00049         }
00050         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00051         {
00052             for (unsigned int k=0; k<NO_OF_BANKS; k++)
00053             {
00054                 dc[i].dramBankBusyTime[j][k] = 0;
00055                 dc[i].dramBankBusyCycles[j][k] = 0;     
00056             }       
00057         }
00058     }
00059 }

00073 void DRAM::SetLinks()
00074 {
00075     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00076     {
00077         dc[i].parent = this;
00078         dc[i].mc = mc;
00079         dc[i].child = (Component*)(&((Bus*)parent)->dataBus[i]);
00080     }                   
00081 }

00130 /*
00131  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132  *       Class:  DRAM
00133  *      Method:  process_event
00134  * Description:  ((Bus*)((DRAM*)parent)->parent)->
00135  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136  */
00137 void DRAMChannel::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00138 {
00139 //    DRAMCmdState *cmd = new DRAMCmdState();
00140     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00141     DRAMCmdState *cmd = ((DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0));   //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links        
00142 
00143     switch (cmd->cmd)
00144     {
00145         case PRECHARGE: 
00146              dramBusyTime = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_RP);
00147              dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_RP);      
00148              break;
00149         case ACTIVATE:
00150              dramBusyTime = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_RCD);
00151              dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_RCD);     
00152              break;
00153         case WRITE:
00154              dramBusyTime = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_WR);
00155              dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_WR);      
00156              break;
00157         case READ:
00158              dramBusyTime = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_CAS);
00159              dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_CAS);     
00160              break;
00161         case ALL_BANK_REFRESH:
00162              dramBusyTime = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_RFC);
00163              for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_BANKS; i++)
00164              {          
00165                 dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][i] = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_RFC);
00166                 if (dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][i] > (ullint)Simulator::Now())
00167                     dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][i] += 
00168                         (dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][i]-dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][i]);
00169                 else    
00170                     dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][i] += 
00171                         (dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][i]-(ullint)Simulator::Now());
00172              }
00173              break;
00174         default:
00175              cout << "Unknown DRAM command reached DRAM" << endl;       
00176 
00177     }
00178     if (dramBusyCycles > (ullint)Simulator::Now())
00179         dramBusyCycles += (dramBusyTime-dramBusyCycles);
00180     else        
00181         dramBusyCycles += (dramBusyTime-(ullint)Simulator::Now());
00182     if (cmd->cmd != ALL_BANK_REFRESH)
00183     {
00184         if (dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] > Simulator::Now())
00185             dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] += 
00186                         (dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo]-dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo]);
00187         else    
00188             dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] += 
00189                         (dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo]-(ullint)Simulator::Now());
00190     }   
00191 
00192     switch (e->type)
00193     {
00194         case START_READ:
00195 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00196             cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": I am in DRAM READ with " << dec << cmd->cmd << endl;       
00197 #endif               
00198             if (cmd->cmd == READ)
00199             {                
00200                 event->src = (Component*)this;
00201                 event->dst = child;
00202                 event->type = START_READ;       
00203                 event->event_data.push_back((void*)cmd);        //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00204 
00205                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+t_CAS, &DataBusHandler::process_event, (DataBusHandler*)event->dst, event); 
00206             }  
00207             else
00208             {
00209                 delete cmd;
00210                 delete event;
00211             }           
00212         break;
00213         case START_WRITE:
00214 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00215                 cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": I am in DRAM WRITE with " << dec << cmd->cmd << endl;
00216 #endif
00217                 cmd->req.retireTime = (ullint)(Simulator::Now()+t_WR);
00218 #ifdef DEBUG
00219                 cout << dec << Simulator::Now()+t_WR << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": Total Time taken by request " << dec << cmd->req.retireTime - cmd->req.arrivalTime << endl;
00220 #endif
00221                 ((MC*)mc)->stats->CollectStatsPerRequest(&cmd->req);
00222                 delete cmd;
00223                 delete event;
00224         break;
00225         default:
00226                 delete cmd;
00227                 delete event;
00228 #ifdef DEBUG
00229                 cout << Simulator::Now() << ": I should not come to default of process event in DRAM\n";
00230 #endif
00231         break;
00232     }
00233     
00234   //  if (!e->event_data.empty())       
00235   //    delete ((DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0));    
00236     delete e;
00237 }
